Text: piraterobotninja: I downloaded this film but, it does't last for 102 min, its only for 91...so what's up?, you up load the short one?, please answer me!!
this one goes only for 91 min...what's up?
Thanks for pointing that out. I'm going to find out and let you know...

... and the answer is located here:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0113540/trivia

7th bullet point from the bottom:

"The original Pioneer release of the DVD lists the running time as 102 minutes. This is a typo and the version of the movie on the DVD is the same 91 minute version as Trimark DVD."
